challenge.title: Step 55
challenge.description: Create a for loop to iterate over targets_to_print and print the following f-string: f'\n{start}-{node} distance: {distances[node]}\nPath: {" -> ".join(paths[node])}'.

tests.text: You should create a for loop to iterate over targets_to_print. Use node as the loop variable.
You should print the provided string inside your new for loop.
